How to test the beta package:
- Save this sub-package to your HD.
- Completelly delete the current Azure[Sky] package from your project.
- Import to your project only the beta sub-package.

Notes:
- This beta is not backward compatible with the current v7.x.x version cycle.
- Currently, there is no documentation or instruction on how to use the beta version.
- Always save a backup of your project before import or update a third-party package.
- The new v8.x.x version cycle is still a working in progress.
- Expect the new v8.x.x version cycle to work with Unity 2020.3 LTS or higher.
